tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The scenes of Doomsday, or the Day of Judgement, have been described at various points in the Quran. When Doomsday arrives, the present balance of the world will break down, and man will feel himself helpless
distractors: This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The controlled movement of the earth symbolically helps us in understanding the miraculous nature of man’s contact with God through the angel. The axial rotation of the earth is one of the truly remarkable phenomena of this universe
distractors: This verse narrates a historical event
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse promises paradise to the righteous

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The Quran informs us that the Day of Judgement will finally come: all of humanity will be assembled on that Day and will be rewarded or punished according to their deeds
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
